item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Shereen I am a product designer that specializes in both website and mobile applications. Recently graduating from UC Irvine with a B.S. in Informatics, I use my HCI specialization in order to create human-centered designs. When I’m not creating iterative designs, I enjoy keeping up with hockey, eating at new restaurants, and watching the Office. You can view my full resume here. (when I add it lol)

item.title: IoT Exchange
item.description: [add an image here prob lol] Name: IoT Exchange Company: The Channel Company Mentors: Adelaide Reilly, Rauline Ochs, Mark Petter Team members: Team Fluent.ly - Julia Hoang, Victoria Lai, Kyle Mamiit, Chris Pile Overview For my senior design capstone project I teamed up with four other students to design and develop a working web prototype of a matching system for The Channel Company. This system contributes to the growing IoT solution market by matching Information Technology (IT) and Operational Technology (OT) partners together in order to develop solutions to satisfy end customers.

item.title: Projects
item.description: IoT Exchange A matching system for IT and OT partners to easily find each other in order to fulfill IoT Solutions. Coming Soon Coming soon lol Coming Soon Coming soon lol
